1593970.name: The Haunted House : Dark Island
1593970.description:
During a school break the protagonist sets off on a trip and accidentally arrives on an island — only to discover it has been corrupted by a legendary dokkaebi. Even the friends from Shinbi Apartment have been turned dark, plunging the island into a desperate crisis. With the help of Geumbi, the protagonist must purify their friends and band together to defeat the dokkaebi.

  • Beloved Shinbi Apartment characters and ghosts reborn as charming pixel art.
    Capture cute ghosts, raise them, and use them to defeat enemies. Deploy a variety of ghosts to purify the corrupted island.

  • [Active Command] system — dynamic, animation-style combat recreated in a turn-based RPG.
    We breathe new life into turn-based battles by making them more dynamic: inspect your opponent’s skill, choose a counter skill, and let those abilities clash.

  • Strategic combat using diverse attributes and skills.
    Matchups between ghost types, interactions between skills, and other tactical elements decide the outcome of each battle. Make careful, turn-by-turn choices to vanquish your foes.
